Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel Clindamycin (0.015 to 2 mcg/ml)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of aerobic streptococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel Clindamycin assessing susceptibility of aerobic streptococci including S. pneumoniae using instrument and manual MIC determination.
Indications for Use Summary: Determination of quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of aerobic streptococci, including Streptococcus pneumoniae, using Clindamycin on the MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel with instrument read capability.
